page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In our area, very few people have been unemployed during the last five years. Alarge majority work outside our survey area.The average distance travelled to work is 23 miles, mostly covered by car or train, but one business man flies more than 100,000 miles each year,while another man walks only 6 metres to his garden shed.Most of the men have management or executive_type jobs, but other jobs include a wood turner and farmers.Many people moved to this area because it is easy to commute to Londonand the A1 is nearby, and also housing is not too expensive. Other main places of employment are R.A.F.Brampton and the USAF base ar Alconbury.
